divs: Sighting Detailswell my girl frend and i went to the ST louis arch on our vacation and it was about 10 at night we looked up and noticed something strange and took a pic of it might have lasted about 2 min we have a photo of it during and one right after when it seemed to just have vanashed when it was thare it apeired to be rotating witch you can clearly see in the photo
Summary: Saw UFO while on Vacation in STL
